img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(92\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3c/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2892%29.png)
You'll see a door on the left, near hanging yellow fabric. Open this, and head down the stairs toward the statue. The health bar for the Gray-Bronze Cart will appear, but you don't need to worry about fighting it just yet.
img_below_text:
Follow the path to the left and toward the cave at the end of it. Just before you get there, you'll see another green Wisp to be collected to the left. Once you've grabbed it, head inside the cave.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(95\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2895%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 49 from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(92\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3c/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2892%29.png)
You'll see a door on the left, near hanging yellow fabric. Open this, and head down the stairs toward the statue. The health bar for the Gray-Bronze Cart will appear, but you don't need to worry about fighting it just yet."
            - Following Text: "Follow the path to the left and toward the cave at the end of it. Just before you get there, you'll see another green Wisp to be collected to the left. Once you've grabbed it, head inside the cave.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(95\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2895%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts a rocky, dimly lit area with a character standing in the foreground, holding a weapon. A glowing green Wisp is highlighted on the left, surrounded by a red marker, indicating it can be collected. An arrow points toward a dark cave entrance on the right, suggesting the next objective or path to follow.

2. **Purpose/Narrative Role**:  
The image serves as a visual guide in the walkthrough, showing the player where to collect the green Wisp before proceeding toward the cave entrance to continue the journey. It emphasizes exploration and progression within the game.
